channel.title: Comments on: Bill Rosemann (Vice President of Marvel Games) on Spider Man 2: ‚ÄúIf Marvel‚Äôs Spider-Man was Star Wars, Marvel‚Äôs Spider-Man 2 is kind of our Empire Strikes Back. It gets a little darker. It‚Äôs the next big chapter.‚Äù

item.title: By: ThrowawayNo2103
item.dc:creator: ThrowawayNo2103
item.description: Movies comparing something to 'Empire Strikes Back' is the video game equivalent of comparing everything to Dark Souls.
item.content:encoded: Movies comparing something to ‘Empire Strikes Back’ is the video game equivalent of comparing everything to Dark Souls.

item.title: By: calbhollo
item.dc:creator: calbhollo
item.description:
Was Empire Strikes Back that much darker? An entire planet was blown up in the first film.
In Spider-Man a terrorist attack kills millions of New Yorkers. In what way is it going to get darker?
item.content:encoded:
Was Empire Strikes Back that much darker? An entire planet was blown up in the first film.

In Spider-Man a terrorist attack kills millions of New Yorkers. In what way is it going to get darker?

item.content:encoded: This is gonna be on PS5 only yeah?

item.title: By: chazzergamer
item.dc:creator: chazzergamer
item.description:
*series takes a slightly darker turn*
Everyone: THIS IS THE EMPIRE STRIKES BACK OF WHATEVER!!!!
I mean I‚Äôm curious by the game but don‚Äôt just say the same stuff over and over, tease us with something new.
Personally I hope that make the swinging more skill base. It‚Äôs far too easy to swing in the last games, was practically auto pilot.
Let players risk messing up its okay we can take it!
item.content:encoded:
*series takes a slightly darker turn*

Everyone: THIS IS THE EMPIRE STRIKES BACK OF WHATEVER!!!!

I mean I‚Äôm curious by the game but don‚Äôt just say the same stuff over and over, tease us with something new.

Personally I hope that make the swinging more skill base. It‚Äôs far too easy to swing in the last games, was practically auto pilot.

Let players risk messing up its okay we can take it!

item.title: By: MechaJerkzilla

item.description: Does that make Spider-Man: Miles Morales your Star Wars Holiday Special? (Not commenting on the game‚Äôs quality, as i havent played it yet, just on the timing of the releases, that‚Äôs where it falls in that specific analogy)
item.content:encoded: Does that make Spider-Man: Miles Morales your Star Wars Holiday Special? (Not commenting on the game‚Äôs quality, as i havent played it yet, just on the timing of the releases, that‚Äôs where it falls in that specific analogy)
